resources.string: Nothing found, try another search query

● Query rijksmuseum data bij searching for authors like "Rembrandt" and "Vermeer"

 ● Results are paginated so you can scroll plenty

 ● Press on a result to see its details

 ● Favorite a piece of art to save it in a local database

 ● Art pieces in the favorites tab are grouped by author, identifiable by the header

Made by Berkan Serbest. The following technologies were used:

 - LiveData
 - MVVM Architecture
 - Room database
 - Navigation component
 - Dagger-Hilt
 - Paging 3
 - Retrofit, OkHttp
 - Moshi
 - Coil
 - MockK (testing)
